to deprive<WH5186> the needy<WH1800> from justice,<WH1779> and to rob<WH1497> the poor<WH6041> among my people<WH5971> of their rights,<WH4941> that widows<WH490> may be their spoil,<WH7998> and that they may make the fatherless<WH3490> their prey!<WH962>
